PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-13712012-10-18,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectIndian Art-I-Crafts of Ontario Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits goods and services tax (GST) to INDIAN ART-I-CRAFTS of Ontario in respect of input tax credits disallowed in error by Canada Revenue Agency officials for the period of January 1, 2003 to December 31, 2006.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2012-0079 Publication Date: 2012-11-07
AttachmentsAttachment
